definition: any of various usually edible freshwater percoid fishes having compressed bodies and shiny scales, to clean a wooden ship's bottom with heat, by softening the pitch before scraping
details:
noun
- any of various usually edible freshwater percoid fishes having compressed bodies and shiny scales
= synonyms: freshwater bream
- any of numerous marine percoid fishes especially (but not exclusively) of the family Sparidae
= synonyms: sea bream
- flesh of any of various saltwater fishes of the family Sparidae or the family Bramidae
= synonyms: sea bream
- flesh of various freshwater fishes of North America or of Europe
= synonyms: freshwater bream
verb
- to clean a wooden ship's bottom with heat, by softening the pitch before scraping
= example: to clean a wooden ship's bottom with heat, by softening the pitch before scraping
